MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://pad.asp-software.org

Program_Info.Program_Change_Info: Unicode, function filterfor, buttons tooltips, bigger font

English.Char_Desc_80: High precision scientific calculator for Windows.
English.Char_Desc_250: Precise Calculator has more than 150 mathematical functions which can return as many digits as you need. It can calculate with integers, real numbers, complex numbers, fractions, vectors, matrices. It is programmable by commands if, goto, for, print.
English.Char_Desc_450: Precise Calculator has more than 150 mathematical functions and all of them can return as many digits as you need. It can calculate with integers, real numbers, complex numbers, fractions, vectors, matrices. Commands if, goto, for, print can be used to create scripts. History and macros will save your time. You can edit and repeat previous expressions. Frequently used expressions can be saved as macro.
English.Char_Desc_2000: Precise Calculator can return as many significant digits as you need. It can calculate with integers, real numbers, complex numbers, fractions, vectors, matrices. Commands if, goto, for, print can be used to create scripts. You can use history to edit and repeat previous expressions. Frequently used expressions can be saved as macro. Some useful macros are included in the package - Quadratic equation, Cubic equation, Prime numbers, Divisors, Geometry, Statistics. The calculator has more than 150 mathematical functions - exp, log, sinh, pi, mod, abs, round, random, hex, fact, permut, gcd, degtorad, polynom, integral, invert, sort, sum, var, foreach, ...
